title: Jenin 2pc Grommet Thermal Insulated Room Darkening Bedroom and Living Room Curtain Window Treatment Blackout Curtains Energy Saving Panel -Burgundy 54 inch 2PC 52Wx54L

description: Package Includes: Set of 2 blackout curtains; Each panel measures 52 Inch wide. Each curtain panel has 8 silver metal grommets on top. Each grommet inner diameter is 1.6 inch, comparable with most rods. Easy to hang, and slide smoothly. Easy to care: Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures. Many Colors and Sizes to Choose From. 24", 36", 45", 54", 63", 84", 95", 108". Insulate against summer heat and winter chill to balance your room temperature, cut down energy bills. Reduce outside noise, protect floor and upholstery from color shading. Available in Many Colors Beige, Black, Burgundy, Coffee, Gold, Hot Pink, Hunter Green, Light Blue, Light Pink, Lilac, Lime Green, Navy, Orange, Peach, Purple, Red, Royal Blue, Sage, Silver, Slate Blue, Teal, Taupe , Turquoise, White, Yellow, Dark Grey, Dusty Pink. These thermal insulated window curtains help create a cool home shelter as they can keep heat out during summer and trap heat in during winter, aiding in saving on utility bills. Our smooth, soft and noise reducing curtains are the ideal tools for those who live in noisy neighborhoods or busy streets.
